project.name: cloudfuse
project.description:
Mosso's Cloud Files is a remote storage system which is similar in principle to Amazon's S3. It provides a simple RESTful interface to storing and retrieving objects.
http://www.mosso.com/cloudfiles.jsp cloudfuse is a simple filesystem implemented with FUSE which provides access to Cloud Files.
It is still quite rough, but should improve with time and use.

license.name: gpl
